scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules src/plugin/node_modules src/cli/node_modules src/cli/dist src/core/dist src/parser/dist src/plugin/dist src/refactor/dist src/runtime-wrapper/dist src/semantic/dist src/transpiler/dist .eslintcache reports tmp node_debug.log eslint-suppressions.json
scripts.lint:ci: eslint . --ext .ts,.yml,.yaml --max-warnings=0 --report-unused-disable-directives && pnpm run lint:workflows && pnpm run lint:yaml
scripts.report: bash -lc 'status=0; pnpm run build:ts || status=$?; pnpm run lint:report || status=$?; pnpm run lint:duplicates:report || status=$?; pnpm run test:ci || status=$?; pnpm run stats:report || status=$?; pnpm run tree:report || status=$?; pnpm run cli generate-quality-report || status=$?; exit $status'
scripts.check: pnpm run format:check && pnpm run lint:ci && pnpm test
scripts.test:ensure-junit:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='reports/tests.xml'; const status=process.env.TEST_STATUS ?? 'unknown'; const xml=fs.existsSync(p)?fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8').trim():''; const ok=xml.startsWith('<?xml')&&xml.includes('<testsuites')&&xml.includes('</testsuites>'); if(!ok){const m='Test runner exited with status '+status+' before producing a valid JUnit report.'; const e=m.replace(/&/g,'&').replace(/</g,'<').replace(/>/g,'>').replace(/"/g,'"').replace(/\x27/g,'''); fs.writeFileSync(p,`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<testsuites>
  <testsuite name="test-runner" tests="1" failures="1" errors="0" skipped="0">
    <testcase name="test-runner"><failure message="${e}">${e}</failure></testcase>
  </testsuite>
</testsuites>
`,'utf8'); }"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:ts && bash -lc 'mapfile -t tests < <(pnpm -s test:files); ((${#tests[@]})) || { echo "No compiled test files found under dist/ or test/" >&2; exit 1; }; node --test --test-timeout=120000 "${tests[@]}"'
scripts.test:report: bash -lc 'mkdir -p reports; rm -f reports/tests.xml; mapfile -t tests < <(pnpm -s test:files); ((${#tests[@]})) || { echo "No compiled test files found under dist/ or test/" >&2; exit 1; }; node --test --test-reporter=junit --test-reporter-destination=reports/tests.xml "${tests[@]}"; status=$?; TEST_STATUS=$status pnpm -s test:ensure-junit; exit $status'
scripts.test:coverage: bash -lc 'rm -f reports/lcov.info && mkdir -p reports && ./node_modules/.bin/c8 --reporter=lcovonly --report-dir=reports node --test "**/*.test.js"; status=$?; rm -rf .nyc_output reports/tmp reports/lcov-report; exit $status'
scripts.test:ci: bash -lc 'mkdir -p reports; rm -f reports/lcov.info reports/tests.xml; mapfile -t tests < <(pnpm -s test:files); ((${#tests[@]})) || { echo "No compiled test files found under dist/ or test/" >&2; exit 1; }; ./node_modules/.bin/c8 --reporter=lcovonly --report-dir=reports node --test --test-reporter=junit --test-reporter-destination=reports/tests.xml "${tests[@]}"; status=$?; TEST_STATUS=$status pnpm -s test:ensure-junit; rm -rf .nyc_output reports/tmp reports/lcov-report; exit $status'
scripts.build: pnpm run build:ts && pnpm run build:gml-identifiers && pnpm run build:feather-metadata
scripts.memory: pnpm --filter @gml-modules/cli run build:types && node --expose-gc ./src/cli/dist/index.js memory --format human
scripts.postinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive && git update-index --skip-worktree vendor/* && chmod -R a-w vendor && chmod -R a+X vendor && chmod -R u+w vendor/3DSpider || echo "Skipping vendor submodules" && patch-package
scripts.submodules: git submodule foreach --recursive 'git reset --hard && git clean -fd' && git submodule sync --recursive && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote
scripts.demo:watch: pnpm --filter @gml-modules/runtime-wrapper run build:types && pnpm --filter @gml-modules/cli run build:types && node ./src/cli/dist/index.js prepare-hot-reload && node ./src/cli/dist/index.js watch vendor/3DSpider --verbose --no-runtime-server
